website_summaries.verdict: Fun and fascinating, with enough built-in activities to keep toddlers busy for hours.
pros: Easy to assemble and turn on
Chair and table are sturdy and hold up to kids of different ages
Variety of interactive sheets available to change up the learning experience
cons: Table surface is very touch-sensitive and can go haywire if leaned or rested on
Table legs can be pulled off easily
Desk top does not lock in the “up” position and can fall back down

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (3 years old) absolutely loves this table. Very durable and so many interactive games and activities. I love that the music player has a choice for so many songs as well as full length songs- so often you get stuck with a 15 second clip of song that your kid repeats over and over. We've had the table for about a month now, and still have not even used all of the features! Absolutely great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: LTH

customer_reviews.title: What should I do with the useless activity card
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to give zero star if there is an option. Totally pissed by the activity card. Got 2 extra cards in the package, and only one page actually worked! Every time, I slide in the other 3 pages it keeps saying "please insert the cartridge that matches this page"! It totally makes no sense, since one page worked but the other side did not! What should I do with the useless activity card? Cannot stand the disappointing face of my little one!
customer_reviews.author: LZ

customer_reviews.title: terrible service and do not stand behind their products
customer_reviews.text: Did not last long, Has serious electronic issues. Tried calling Vtech they say because we bought it off Amazon they cannot help us. Never again will we buy Vtech... Junk, terrible service and do not stand behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: N9LYA

customer_reviews.title: Product didn't work and couldn't get replacement
customer_reviews.text: This toy does not work. We did our homework reviewing activity desks and chose this one, so we were excited when it arrived. Unfortunately it didn't work. It is supposed to read the two-sided activity cards but would only read oners side. This happened for every activity card that came with the unit, and with every card in the expansion pack we got. Very frustrating for my toddler. We tried to get the item replaced, but the vendor only offered a refund. When Amazon inquired again, we were told the toy is backlogged until June. Don't bother, folks.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Futran

customer_reviews.title: HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old son for Christmas. I took it out of the box a few days ago and installed the batteries. It worked good for a few hours then started to sound like if the speaker wires were bridging. Try tuning a short wave radio and you’ll understand what I am saying.
customer_reviews.author: Deltadelta

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product! Gave it as a gift for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product! Gave it as a gift for my niece for Christmas and she cannot keep off of it! Buying the additional expansions for the desk definitely came in handy as she went from one to another all day. It seems very accommodating for her and it is easy for her to get to know the toy and understand how to use it. She needed very little help
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, worked for one day now everytime the little one turns it on it keeps repeating it’s self it’s so annoying Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but too sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I'm going out of my god damn mind hearing "this is" "this is" "this is" over and over again because the desk is too sensitive to touch and it can't get a word out before it's triggered again. I'm inches away from throwing it out into a snowbank. Cute concept and maybe it will be better when my little is older, but right now it's making me a bit ragey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She is learning while it is fun for her
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my daughter for her 1st birthday. She loves this!!! she started to only use it to play with and hear it sing. Now she points to the things on the table and the inserts and says "this" and we tell her what "this" is. She is now 16 months and we are slowly using it as a teaching tool. She is learning while it is fun for her. I am going to be asking for the additions to it for her birthday and xmas.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Great learning table, buy it as soon as your child is standing!
customer_reviews.text: We love this activity desk. It is great for a new walker who can stand at it and play music and dance or it is great for a toddler who has better motor skills and can work on the activity cards. My only complaint is that if you buy separate additional learning cards, the ages on them aren't too accurate. Our 3 year old aged beyond the 3-5 year old cards much quicker than the age range suggests. So, if Vtech makes more age appropriate cards, this is a must have! If they don't, then make sure you buy it as soon as your child starts pulling himself or herself up to a standing position to maximize usage.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Bought used and doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item fulfilled by Amazon used. Said the only thing wrong was that the items packaging was damaged. When I put batteries in the toy, the “activity mode” didn’t work at all. I kept trying to put flip the switch to activity mode and the table would say “switch to activity mode”. This basically meant that the touch feature on the desk surface didn’t work at all. I will try purchasing new and hope it works better.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Great for neurotypical as well as atypical children!
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance on this desk as my son is nonverbal and typically does not play with toys functionally. But he loves, LOVES numbers! So I figured he would play with the numbers on it if nothing else. He LOVES THIS! If it breaks I’m sure I will buy another. It comes with four sheets to play different things. I bought the extra big pack to go with it. He got this in January and he has yet to even need more sheets. So I could’ve done without them. Great toy for all kids!
customer_reviews.author: Ree014

customer_reviews.title: Good - but could be better with a few minor changes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2yo and he seems to really enjoy it! I'm sort of waiting for it to short circuit because he leans against it and pushes multiple buttons at once. He'll eventually learn not to do that. I do have a few items on my wishlist for a future design of this desk. I wish there was a cup holder on one side or another, I also wish the activity mats could somehow be locked in since they slide out so easily, and the voice that's been recorded on the "phone" (that doesn't come out, btw) is really weird/creepy. Other than that, its cute and not terribly expensive for what it is. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift Ideas for Kiddos!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a couple of these for my Boss and my mentor's kids. They were very satisfied that I gave them a colorful, learning/toy. Used it for coloring activities as well!!! Lost one star due to the price other than that its a multi-use gift for any kiddo. Thanks, Seller and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie D.

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my soon to be 3 year old for Christmas. He absolutely loved it! However, after about an hour of play, it started catching on the letter “x”. He would try to do another activity such as play with the numbers, but it would interrupt what he was doing, and it would always repeat “x” whenever he tried to do something else. Called Amazon, and they offered a refund. I bought another one. I really hope this new one works, and we just got a faulty one.
customer_reviews.author: Heather C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Activity
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3-year old granddaughter. She is still too young for most of the activities, but loves the colors and shapes. I think she will enjoy more as she grows. Probably would have been a better gift for a four-year old.
customer_reviews.author: Birdwatcher

customer_reviews.title: Great learning toy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son for Christmas and he had just turned 2 recently. If you have a child who has a short attention span or likes to move things around you may want to wait until they are a bit older. He constantly removed the replaceable sheets and got easily distracted by all the buttons and then overwhelmed. Now that he's almost 3 he does a lot better with it and seems to enjoy it a bit more. I like that you can buy inserts that you can use to help your child learn more. Makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and colorful with a great volume, but the tabs can be tricky.
customer_reviews.text: My 3yo and my 6 yo love this, especially the music part. My only problem with this is that the insert sheets that change the topic. This comes with (2) two-sided heavy plastic "sheets" that are designed to lay flat on the table top and insert the tabs into a little slot to change the topic. The little tab often gets stuck and will not play if not inserted absolutely flat. Pretty easy to fix, but it can be annoying. Other than that, the product is awesome! very sturdy and colorful (and a volume button that will enable it to blare if you so choose). I only gave it a 4 because of those darn tabs.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Spence

customer_reviews.title: amazing entertainment and an education tool for the little one
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing entertainment and an education tool for the little one...especially if your little one is obsessed with letters and numbers. The activity sheet are not the the easiest to insert for young ones so 2 and 3 year Olds may need assistance or atleast increased patience. Also the touch surface is very sensitive so very young ones will take some time to learn how not to unintentionally touch the surface.
customer_reviews.author: DR. DK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Description. Quick delivery. My 2 year old absolutely loved this, he instantly wanted to play with it! Comes with a stool too. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My grandson needs to grow into it, but it's really nice.
customer_reviews.text: I'd give this a 5, but my grandson is 2 (the starter age for it) and other than stand on it (it's very sturdy!), use it like a dining table, and put in the cassettes and the cards (not the matching ones), and I think the toddler should be a bit older before getting this. Although he loves "The Wheels on the Bus" song, and hitting the wheel on the bus (it has a sensor in the desk), over and over as fast as he can. We're working on it though. :)
customer_reviews.author: KRunsonlattes

customer_reviews.title: Fingers crossed...
customer_reviews.text: We are still new to using this. Touch pad seems a little dull, but with a kids toy maybe that’s better than being super sensitive? I just feel like I can see my kids getting frustrated over that. If my kids take to this I will buy the add on packs. So far my 3.5 yr old is slightly interested and my 22month old is a bit less interested. Bought it mostly for him so hoping he grows into it.
customer_reviews.author: HeidiT

customer_reviews.title: Fun but annoying
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this toy, especially because he has his own seat that fits him perfectly. The toy is pretty annoying in general, though. The voice will say what the picture is immediately after you push the button and you can push multiple buttons in a row. The voice can't finish what it's saying before the next button is pushed. With a toddler sitting there pushing every button he can, it ends up being very loud and annoying. Otherwise, very easy to assemble and a fun toy for a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlie Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Good thing, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. My 1,9 years old likes to play and draw on it, she hides some snacks under the desk. At first she pressed the letters all together, but now she understood the principle of work. One minus I spotted is that it’s not as steady in an easel position of the desk. I put it in front of the wall, so my daughter can press more with pencil when she draw. And also it will not replace the regular kids table, as I hoped
customer_reviews.author: Nataliia

customer_reviews.title: Feeling a bit of the regrets
customer_reviews.text: My little one is going on two so maybe my review is a little too early based on how she uses it. The pictures/choices are very touch sensitive. When she chooses a letter and moves her hand just a bit you end up hearing a jumble of letters together, each one interrupting the other one. The first time she sat down with it I wanted to throw it out the window. I'm holding onto it because she likes it and I'm hoping it won't be so annoying when she can understand to only press one thing at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Mayzie

customer_reviews.title: It received wonderful reviews. He has been playing with it for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this at Christmas for me 3 year old grandson. It received wonderful reviews. He has been playing with it for a month and now the screen freezes. Doesn’t respond by touch. My grandson plays very carefully so this wasn’t because he was being rough. Now unable to exchange because the return policy ended January 31. So he barely played with it. Very sad it didn’t work out.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Combs

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, especially for independent kids!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2, one for each of my boys, ages 5 And 2. They both have their own and live playing with these and learning different things! We also bought the Preschool and Kindergarten bundle packages. Great combination! Also love how the table automatically comes with a few pages to get started instead of just the table top one! Gives them extra to explore while seeing how well they liked them!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie O

customer_reviews.title: Good toddler/preschooler learning center
customer_reviews.text: The pages don't stay in very good, and the non slip rubber pads fell off pretty quick so we are unable to use the stool until my daughter is a little older and less accident prone. But it's a nice learning center for a toddler...she really likes the music page and is becoming more interested in the other activities as she gets older. Buying the additional activity pages gets kind of spendy, but it comes with 4 when you purchase the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT learning tool
customer_reviews.text: GREAT learning tool. Our son plays with it all the time and has learned letters, words and sound association when we do not have the time to read to him (pretty much any time around clean up time after lunch and dinner. HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Not appropriate for younger toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is a good idea, but the table top is so sensitive to touch that it is not a good idea for younger toddlers. We bought this for our just turned 2 yr old grandson and he loves it but cannot play in activity mode without every little touch setting it off. He likes to play on the letter page but if he leans his arm on the table to touch a letter it sets off all the wrong letters. Very frustrating to try and make a child understand to only touch a single letter and absolutely nothing else on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Tolbert

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it at the first two days then just use it as a simple desk. Maybe 2 years boy is too early for that. As other reviews said, the screen is too sensitive. When my son leans on it covers multiple letters or touches one letter and his other figures touch another, you will here these letters sounds are interrupted one after another and none of them can be heard clearly. Will see if he understands months after
customer_reviews.author: shawn wang

customer_reviews.title: No extra pages - false advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I love this table, but I'm very disappointed that mine didn't come with an instruction booklet/safety booklet, AND it didn't come with any of the extra pages. The extra pages were the main reason I wanted this deluxe table. During these times, it is very inconvenient to have to return a product or wait on hold for customer service, since you have to call Vtech and not Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Justice

customer_reviews.title: Great .product
customer_reviews.text: Needed a gift for my one year old grandaughter . I wanted something fun and educational. A friend of mine had one and I loved it. I recently went to visit little Willa and she is enjoying it a lot. It might be better suited for maybe an 18-24 mo child, but I have no regrets. I love that it can be played with either standing up or sitting at the desk.
customer_reviews.author: GLENN R

customer_reviews.title: Xmas gift for grandson..it didn’t even work..very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this activity center for my two-year-old grandson for Christmas. He was so excited to play with it, but had to wait for mama to buy batteries. When batteries installed the activity center will not come on at all and my grandson is very upset. Cannot believe it does nothing. Very disappointed in this product. And the fact my grandson was upset and hurt he couldn’t use the gift I got him makes me even madder and more upset!!! Wish I could not this product even one star that’s how mad and upset I am
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Wilson

customer_reviews.title: well worth getting
customer_reviews.text: this was for my 2 yo grandson, very sturdy plastic, not for an adult but definitely anyone 10 and under, the lights, sounds,and graphics really caught his eye . he started to fill the the storage areas with crayons and pencils. he placed his activity sheets in the desk in short he loves it i would recommend this toy to everyone
customer_reviews.author: mlmoore

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old is in love with this desk!!!! She loves to sit there and play the different games. It works great as a little art desk too. We like to put some coloring sheets up and let her color. Everything stays all nice and need in the one desk. This was a great gift for her!!! I also love that you can purchase more activity sheets with different age ranges so that as they grow up you can get them more challenging activities.
customer_reviews.author: Milly Theriot Mullens

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this as a Christmas present for my grandson in 2017 he was 2 at the time and he learned so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The little boy that I bought this for is two ...
customer_reviews.text: The little boy that I bought this for is two years old. His mom says that he hardly ever leaves this little table since he opened it for Christmas because he loves it so much. He even eats there now because she can't convince him half the time to stop playing with it. If I could give this a higher rating, then I definitely would.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My two year old grandson loves this. I bought it for a Christmas gift and it's over at my daughters house so I didn't assemble it or see it in person but she claims the kids love it. I gave it four stars only because I didn't see it and I'm not sure how easy it is to assemble, not sure how sturdy or how well it works. All I know is that the kids like using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for preparing for preschool
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2.5 year old to prepare for preschool. He loves playing with it and the expansion packs give even more use to the desk. My only issue is the stool, I wish there were screws to keep the legs on as he is obsessed with taking them off, but it really is a non issue. I may use epoxy to keep them from coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 3 month. When contacted customer service, I was told that it is out of warranty period and nothing can be done about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item was defective
customer_reviews.text: I tried put is together. I then had my nephew try. One of the ends was defective. It just did not fit. Had to return it, but returning it was easy. No hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Britt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for our friends 3 year old. He loved the chalk board and doing his ABC’s plus having his own little desk. Pretty sturdy too. If you’d like you can purchase additional packages for age levels
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J.

customer_reviews.title: Great learning toy
customer_reviews.text: It is a great way for kids to learn new things. My son learned how to say “zebra” (although slightly mispronounced) by playing with it for roughly 1-2 days. So definitely helps the child learn on it’s own.
customer_reviews.author: N. Kuri

customer_reviews.title: Great Learning Tool
customer_reviews.text: My 2-year old loves this activity desk! He had some difficulty waiting to follow the commands at first due to his age, but is now able to follow along! He loves the chalkboard option. I like the fact that I can add on to the activities as he grows. This desk will grow with him over the next few years and provide a fun, educational activity for him.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: VTech Touch & Learn Activity Desk Deluxe
customer_reviews.text: Bought this activity table for my 3 yr old grandson for Christmas. He loves it. Especially the part where he can call his friends! It was a huge hit with him. It is sturdy and very quick and easy to assemble. I also bought the expansion pack to go along with it. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Lady

customer_reviews.title: Not just a toy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this several years ago, it is very helpful as both a toy and learning activity. My granddaughters (6 & 4) like to play with it. They had late birthdays so it is helping to reinforce what they are learning.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this for stay at home parents
customer_reviews.text: Besides the fact that I can't get my kids to focus on it the way I would like them to, I like this time, the additional sheets it came with. the chair, the music. I don't think that I have any complaints at all about this product. I only scored it a 4 out of 5 b/c everything has room for improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: Product failure while still new
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, 2 year old daughter plugged the cartridge in for the first time, and it doesn't work. Expected more from a product that is designed for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Larry MF Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Good play set that will grow with your little one
customer_reviews.text: Too sensitive to touch. My son leans his elbows on the table and always accidentally touches one or more of the sensors and the machine keeps repeating the accidentally touched item. It gets really annoying. He's around 2 now and I'll wait until he's older before he can play with it. The music and other features are fine for him to play with now.
customer_reviews.author: Ji Ling Ni

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with expansion packs
customer_reviews.text: Not compatible with the expansion packs. So it’s pretty useless
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great learning toy for toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: My toddlers love this toy. So many buttons to push for interactive play. The stool isn't as secure as I would like but overall my kiddos think it's a superb toy. We will be ordering more activity cards for the desk soon.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great for the homeschool room.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 2 year old son and he’s just starting to use it correctly a year later. He likes to push the table and listen to the music but 2 was a little early for our son at least. He loves it now at almost 3 :) it’s a great product. He plays with it during school time for our older child.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Partin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Works great and my daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Works great and my daughter loves it. It has little rubber pads for the legs of the table and chair which are great so it doesn’t scoot around. The cards can go under the top, but it’s not really a designated spot and when the kids open the lid they just come out. But other than that it’s good
customer_reviews.author: GoFins

customer_reviews.title: New and improved
customer_reviews.text: We had an older version of this desk - this one does so much more...and the expansion packs are great so that older kids can enjoy it too. My kids love this desk. I homeschool, so this is a great tool to keep the younger ones busy, learning and entertained while I work with the older ones.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen C.

customer_reviews.title: Toy did not turn on.
customer_reviews.text: This product never worked! Such a waste of money. Do not buy this piece of junk. I change a couple batteries to see if that was the problem and it never worked.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Voice over is very annoying! Will not just say ABC’s
customer_reviews.text: Voice over is very annoying! Will not just say ABC’s, but will repeatively say “this is” ....OMG! Also for the extra activity cards the storage underneath the table isn’t equipped so the cards constantly fly out.
customer_reviews.author: Carmel96

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for learning and playing!
customer_reviews.text: My son adores this toy! And I love that I can change out the activities to help him learn new things! He's still a little young for it, but as he grows, it's going to be a wonderful toy that helps him learn and play!
customer_reviews.author: HK Knotts

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy for a 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter when she was about 2. She played with it just to see it light up but now that she is 3 she really plays with it like it is supposed to be played with. Very nice toy for learning.
customer_reviews.author: Zingo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves this product, it’s fun and helps him learn the alphabet, sounds, and words.
customer_reviews.author: Kinnary V Vyas

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Now my daughter is about to turn four she really Enjoys using it. Great educational toy. And this toy is strong it gets a real beat down because I got it when she was only 2 years old
customer_reviews.author: Happy mom2015

customer_reviews.title: Fun, interactive, and it's not HUGE, would recommend and would buy again
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this, and even though he's still learning how to play and use it, the music on it is awesome, and he has options. i love that he will be able to grow with this. Only downfall, the legs on the chair don't like to stay in, and can be easily taken out, so my son likes to pull it apart.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy and so does my 2 year old! He treats it more as a table than anything but he seems to really be proud of this little table. The interactive sheets are full of words/colors/sounds and things to learn!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Deere

customer_reviews.title: my 2 years old son doesn't like it that much but we're still giving it a
customer_reviews.text: my 2 years old son doesn't like it that much but we're still giving it a try
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great but the execution is lacking. The speech mechanism is very glitch prone and therefore it is difficult to really use the machine to its fullest.
customer_reviews.author: MsK2363

customer_reviews.title: Learning Table
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son loves this table. It can be a little noisy and uses batteries quickly. But I still recommend it. It's a great learning toy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Fun Developmental Toy
customer_reviews.text: Our son enjoys this activity desk. We did have to return our first one (not bought thru amazon but same item.) but the second one functions pretty well. The buttons can be sensitive/sticky from time to time but overall we’re pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carefulbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great learning desk for all ages
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I bought my son. I bought it at an early age but I figured the sooner he was introduced to all these activities the better. Hes 7.5 months, obviously cant use the table correctly but we do an activity together or just have the music going and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: this thing is still working beautifully. I think it will be a great learning ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very abusive to her toys. Mostly, she just likes to take things apart. Future engineer? Today, she managed to get the top off this thing. Even with all her abuse, at my dismay, this thing is still working beautifully. I think it will be a great learning aid when she's old enough to really appreciate what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great, but one of the switches is messed up
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his activity desk! Only issue is the switch to go from learning mode to music mode. The connection on it is awful and will randomly switch between the two... I'm sure this isn't a universal issue, just with the desk I got. It's great otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: FifthPlum

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! It teaches babies so much and there are so many options for them to play with!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Guts

customer_reviews.title: Another quality VTech product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, a ton of activities and it is expandable. What more could you ask for? Quality? This lives up to VTech's reputation for quality merchandise. Both of my kids, 2 and 4, enjoy playing with this and exploring the different cards that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: On/Off feature is messed up.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very dissatisfied with this product. Once it’s on for about five mins, and gets turned off. It will not turn back on. I then replaced the new batteries I just inserted and it acts like they died again! I’m beyond frustrated at having to keep opening the battery back to wiggle or change the batteries I just replaced. Just to make it talk or sing again.
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn

customer_reviews.title: Loveeee
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my 2 YO nephew and he loves it. My 3 year old has owned this for over 2 years and he still plays with it and loves it
customer_reviews.author: Sueham

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My toddler Niece loves sitting and learning. She comes and grabs one of us and asks us to help her. She loves spending time with her VTech. I really recommend this for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Devi

customer_reviews.title: Legs should be screwed in.
customer_reviews.text: It’s good, but the stool is dangerous. Legs don’t stay on, the supplied grips for the feet rubbed off in a month so it slips. My daughter recently took a spill off the stool when one of the legs happened to pop off.
customer_reviews.author: PetitOwlet

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It had a lot of sounds but too advanced for a 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Sportyvet

customer_reviews.title: Great learning toy; keeps kids entertained for hours
customer_reviews.text: My 14 month old nephew loves this Activity Desk Set. It is one of his favorite "go-to" toys and it keeps him entertained for hours. Shipped quickly, and well worth every cent. Good quality, safe for young kids and I love that it's a learning toy. Easy assembly!
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: My tot loves his activity table! The additional cards that you can purchase separately are definitely worth purchasing as they contain so much information and fun activities. At age 2, my child can cite his entire ABCs without hesitation, so I’m one happy parent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Playtime
customer_reviews.text: The parents loved this gift. The child colored and drew pictures on it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 21 mo old granddaughter. She loves it & plays with it for hours. Great learning, & the best part was assembly was a breeze with no tools needed! I had it together in less than 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My son is loving this table! Granted he is under 2, but he loves to sit on the stool and draw. He doesn't quite understand the concept of buttons, but loves the pictures. The stool is sturdy, the table is a bit wobbly, if more weight is applied for it (kids climbing).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a great addition to our house
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this desk. I thought it would be a little too advanced for her (she was about 22 months when we bought it; about 28 months now) but she took to it immediately. She figured out how to use it and change the "cards" right away, and it didn't take too long before she started to figure out the "games" and songs. This was a great addition to our house, and we will be picking up more activity cards soon.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great work table
customer_reviews.text: Great work table for kids but they grow out of this so quickly because it's actually very small.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Le

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe, Deluxe!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the regular model first! There are NO exansion cards for the regular model! If you are going to buy anything buy this model..it has all the expansion cards with cartridges! Don't waste your money on the regular model!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This is our second vtech activity desk. And I think the quality in product has gone down. Slow reaction time and I'm not sure why this one doesn't recognize the cards like the old one did. Wish I could return it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, durable and interactive.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. 2 year old doesn't want to leave the toy. She learned everything in two weeks. Would have benefitted if there were some extra learning sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjeev Anand

customer_reviews.title: I bought the VTECH touch and learn as a gift ...

customer_reviews.title: It’s a grate product for children
customer_reviews.text: I loved it buy my daughter wasn’t really into it but it’s a grate product but it’s not for every kid.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My two year old and one year old love it.

customer_reviews.title: Love the different activity cards it comes wirh
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it. I wish the stool had a back but it’s good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome activity table!
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy this is for a toddler to use and learn from! Very cute and a great size. Also love the rubber grips on the bottom for the table and stool so child won't fall off. Overall happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Not My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 2 year old. She likes the concept but leans on the table which causes nothing to work properly.

customer_reviews.title: Educational and fun!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old granddaughter LOVES this! It’s colorful and gives her lots of hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: MSB

customer_reviews.title: Great BD present
customer_reviews.text: Item was a birthday gift for our 2 year old grandson. Item arrived on time and in great condition. Grandson and his older (4 yr) brother both enjoy using the activity desk
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my son then 20 months, since 2017 and its 3 yrs, no regret, durable,fun, educational and its totally awesome. i changed the battery once. He sometimes use it as a snack table.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Small yet so much to do
customer_reviews.text: It has a bunch of activities for my daughter to play with. However it only came with 2 mats and no chalk . Regardless my three year old adores it.
customer_reviews.author: Nani

customer_reviews.title: Too busy
customer_reviews.text: I really like the idea of this but my daughter didn't like it at all. I think it just has too much going on that it makes it hard for her to focus on just one activity at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: My 1.5yo nephew LOVES it.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift for my 1.5yo nephew. He loves it and is learning a lot. His parents also do a great job of encouraging him to use it, asking him questions to foster his learning. Great purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: erwinandfire

customer_reviews.title: VTech Touch and Learn Activity Desk
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing toy. The VTech company did a great job at designing this activity desk. It seems well built and durable.
customer_reviews.author: shopper1A

product_meta.title: VTech Touch and Learn Activity Desk Deluxe
product_meta.description: The Touch and Learn Activity Desk Deluxe by VTech is a three-in-one desk with interactive activity cards that’s expandable for more fun and discovery! The desk features an interactive desktop and five pages to explore that are filled with engaging content including letters, numbers, music, colors and more. Choose from eight expansion packs (each sold separately) that each focus on a specific curriculum like nursery rhymes, reading skills, animals and numbers. It also transforms from a desk into an easel and chalkboard with plenty of storage space for art supplies to encourage play and discovery. The LED display illustrates letter and number stroke order and how to draw basic shapes. For even more fun, your toddler can play with the toy telephone or listen to fun tunes on the music player. Enjoy hours of fun as you create, discover and learn! Stool included. Requires 4 AA batteries (not included). Intended for ages 2 years and up.
feature_bullets: The Touch and Learn Activity Desk Deluxe is an interactive desk and includes five activity pages to explore that are filled with engaging content
Extend the fun with expansion packs (each sold separately) that include a wide curriculum; LED display illustrates letter and number stroke order and how to draw basic shapes
Transforms from a desk into an easel and chalkboard with storage space for art supplies to encourage play and discovery; stool included

For more ways to play, pretend to make a call on the toy telephone or listen to fun tunes on the music player; progress button reports on child's progress. Fabric care instructions: clean with a damp cloth
Features 100+ vocabulary words, 20+ activities and 20+ songs and melodies; requires 4 AA batteries (not included); intended for ages 2 years and up

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,493 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
